skills.name: Active
skills.description: [SP: 0][CD: 16s] Blasts the ground with star explosion, deal 1200% + 200% ATK of Fire DMG to enemies in an aoe and add [Blazing] state on the traget for 10s, enemies with [Blazing] receive 20% more Fire DMG. When equipped by Spina Astera, when you inflict Starfire on enemies with [Blazing], deal 15% ATK Fire DMG.

skills.name: Passive 1
skills.description: Self Basic ATK(including Combo, Charge) gain Fire DMG +25% against enemies in [Blazing] state. When equipped by Spina Astera, while off-field, recover 20 star meter per second.

skills.name: Passive 2
skills.description: Charged ATK Total DMG +20%. When equiped by Spina Astera, after using Charged ATK or Ultimate, Fire DMG +25% for 10s. During this time, Basic ATK(including Combo, Charge) apply [Blazing] state on enemies hit for 10s.
